mapper.select: SELECT FROM assignments a LEFT JOIN courses c ON a.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users u ON a.teacher_id = u.id WHERE a.deleted = false AND a.status = 'published' AND a.due_date BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) ORDER BY a.due_date ASC
